description: This file is the client entry point for a Remix application, responsible for hydrating the app on the client side using React, Remix, and React DOM.

methods.name: startTransition
methods.description: Initiates a transition for rendering updates, used here to hydrate the app without blocking user interactions.

methods.name: hydrateRoot
methods.description: Hydrates a React component tree into a container element, initializing the React app in the browser.
